pitch.cc: Jake Westbrook is still attacking Anderson Hernandez with the sinker even though Hernandez hit one for a double last time up.
Jake Westbrook really has his changeup working; he's allowing a .220 average against it this season and Astros hitters are 0-for-4 against it in this game.
